mapper.update: UPDATE project_flow_metrics SET wip_count = #{wip}, updated_at = now() WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
UPDATE project_flow_metrics SET throughput_7d = throughput_7d + 1, throughput_30d = throughput_30d + 1, updated_at = now() WHERE project_id = #{projectId}

UPDATE project_dependency_risk SET total_dependencies = #{total}, blocked_dependency_count = #{blocked}, dependency_density = #{density}, risk_score = #{risk}, updated_at = now() WHERE project_id = #{projectId}

UPDATE team_capacity_analytics SET active_tasks = #{activeTasks}, avg_tasks_per_user = #{avgTasks}, overloaded_users = #{overloaded}, burnout_risk_score = #{burnout}, updated_at = now() WHERE team_id = #{teamId}

UPDATE project_health SET schedule_variance_days = #{variance}, overdue_tasks = #{overdue}, blocked_tasks = #{blocked}, health_score = #{score}, risk_level = #{riskLevel}, updated_at = now() WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status NOT IN ('COMPLETED')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND end_date < CURRENT_DATE AND status <> 'COMPLETED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_dependency td JOIN task t ON t.id = td.task_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task_dependency td JOIN task dep ON dep.id = td.depends_on_task_id JOIN task t ON t.id = td.task_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND dep.status <> 'COMPLETED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM task t JOIN project p ON p.id = t.project_id WHERE p.team_id = #{teamId} AND t.status <> 'COMPLETED'
